events: 24 Hour Events:,   Yesterday, pt had EGD, which showed varices but no active bleeding (see,   report below). Had 4 scleral bands placed. No gross blood visible in,   stomach. No addl episodes of hematemesis. No melena, dizziness, or,   lightheadedness this a.m.,   Pt resumed clear liquids diet, and was started on 5-day course of,   Carafate per GI recs.  Afterwards, pt received *4uprbc,s for a Hct of,   20.6. Repeat Hct at 6pm was 32.6.,   In the afternoon, pt complained of mild abdominal pain and increased,   distension, particularly after eating. Likely related to increased,   fluid infusion (IVF, pRBC,s), but no good area to tap (only ~3cm space,   between bowel and abdominal wall.)  KUB obtained showed stool impacted,   in bowel, but none in vault. Bowel regimen advanced., ENDOSCOPY - At [**2139-7-6**] 12:00 PM, PARACENTESIS - At [**2139-7-6**] 07:33 PM,   - Not attempted due to inadequate space,
24 Hour Events:, ENDOSCOPY - At [**2139-7-6**] 12:00 PM,   Paracentesis not done because adequate fluid not seen on ultrasound.,   History obtained from Patient, Interpreter,
